enableAutoScan.title: Enable auto scans
enableAutoScan.description: If enabled, CodeGuru will automatically scan notebook and Python files.

scanFrequency.title: CodeGuru scan frequency (seconds)
scanFrequency.description: Specify desired scan frequency in seconds. The default frequency is every 120 seconds.

region.title: AWS region
region.description: Choose a region to override default region and run CodeGuru scans in the chosen region.
